column4: When I shutdown ubuntu, firefox complains about not being shut down correctly last time.. Do I have to close firefox before I click on shutdown ubuntu :S:S:S

restart apache and see if you get any errors: sudo /etc/init.d/apache restart
I don't know why you get that error but it seems to be the reason why apache is not running.
